Summary:
The CL team is working on implementing the Bellatrix upgrade. The mainnet merge timeline has been updated and it's expected that the merge will happen in mid-September.

The EL team is making progress on the execution layer implementation for Ethereum 2.0, with a focus on finalizing the beacon chain integration. 

There are no new deadlines mentioned but ongoing tasks include completing the Beacon Chain Integration and finishing up any remaining work before mainnet deployment.
